name: MicrochipSensorBoardSkill
0:
”Alexa, ask sensor board, turn the light on”
”Alexa, ask sensor board, what is the temperature”
”Alexa, ask sensor board, what are the button state”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sensor board
des:
The WINC1500 Secure Wi-Fi Board is a Microchip demo board made from a WINC1500 Wi-Fi module, ECC508 crypto chip, SAML21 microcontroller, MCP73833 battery charger IC, and an MIC5317 LDO. There are three buttons, one RGB LED, and one environment sensor on the board.
This skill is to control the LED color, turn the LED on/off, read the button status, read the LED status, read the sensor (temperature, humidity) value and general GPIO Control.
